Instruction: Preheat your oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit (205 degrees Celsius). Grease a baking sheet or line it with parchment paper.
Mix the flour, baking powder, cayenne pepper, salt, grated cheese, and butter in a bowl until well combined. Gradually add water while mixing to form a very stiff dough.
Roll dough into logs that are slightly thicker than a pencil. Cut logs into 4 to 5-inch lengths and place them on the baking sheet.
